mapper.select: SELECT t1.daily_report_id, t4.daily_report_submit_id, t3.report_name, t2.date FROM t_section_daily_report t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN m_section t2 ON t2.section_id = t1.section_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_daily_report t3 ON t3.daily_report_id = t1.daily_report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_daily_report_submit t4 ON t4.date = t2.date AND t4.lms_user_id = #{lmsUserId} AND t4.daily_report_id = t3.daily_report_id WHERE t1.section_id = #{sectionId} AND t1.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg}

SELECT t1.daily_report_id, t2.report_name, t2.file_name, t2.sheet_name, t2.row_company, t2.clm_company, t2.row_user, t2.clm_user, t2.row_date, t2.clm_date, t2.intelligibility_flg, t2.intelligibility_field_num, t2.intelligibility_num, t2.row_intel_fld, t2.clm_intel_fld, t2.row_intel, t2.clm_intel, t2.delete_flg, t3.field_num, t3.field_name, t3.row, t3.clm, t3.input_type, t3.required_flg, t3.range_from, t3.range_to, t4.daily_report_submit_id, t4.date, t5.content, t8.user_name, t6.intelligibility_id, t6.daily_report_submit_id, t6.field_num AS intelligibility_field_num, t6.field_name AS intelligibility_field_name, t6.field_value AS intelligibility_field_value FROM t_section_daily_report t1 INNER JOIN m_daily_report t2 ON t1.daily_report_id = t2.daily_report_id INNER JOIN m_daily_report_detail t3 ON t3.daily_report_id = t2.daily_report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_daily_report_submit t4 ON t4.daily_report_id = t1.daily_report_id AND t4.lms_user_id = #{lmsUserId} AND t4.date = #{date} LEFT OUTER JOIN t_daily_report_submit_detail t5 ON t5.daily_report_submit_id = t4.daily_report_submit_id AND t5.field_num = t3.field_num LEFT OUTER JOIN t_intelligibility t6 ON t6.daily_report_submit_id = t4.daily_report_submit_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_lms_user t7 ON t7.lms_user_id = t4.lms_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_user t8 ON t8.user_id = t7.user_id WHERE t1.daily_report_id = #{dailyReportId} AND t1.section_id = #{sectionId} AND t1.account_id = #{accountId} AND t1.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} ORDER BY t3.field_num
